item.title: My shell migration record
item.description: From bash to zsh Although I switched to the fish shell two weeks after using the zsh shell (the fish shell has a special introduction below), this does not deny that the zsh shell is still a good shell. You can switch from any shell to zsh shell in the following way. Use the following instructions when installing zsh, brew install zsh (MacOS) apt install zsh (Ubuntu / Linux Mint) If you want to know the shell currently installed in the system, enter the following command, cat /etc/shells How to use zsh as your default shell?
